com.williballenthin.rejistry

Interface RegistryHive

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RegistryHiveFile

    public interface RegistryHive

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.nio.ByteBuffer getBuf()
      getBuf fetches a view of the ByteBuffer that backs the hive.
      REGFHeader getHeader()
      getHeader fetches the REGFHeader that defined metadata for this Registry hive.
      RegistryKey getRoot()
      getRoot fetches the root RegistryKey of the hive.

    • Method Detail

      • getRoot

        RegistryKey getRoot()
        getRoot fetches the root RegistryKey of the hive.
        Returns:
        The root of the hive.

      • getBuf

        java.nio.ByteBuffer getBuf()
        getBuf fetches a view of the ByteBuffer that backs the hive. This is probably only used by low level parsing code.
        Returns:
        A read-only ByteBuffer that backs the hive.

      • getHeader

        REGFHeader getHeader()
              throws RegistryParseException
        getHeader fetches the REGFHeader that defined metadata for this Registry hive.
        Returns:
        The header of the hive.
        Throws:
        RegistryParseException
